title: Need Help. Can't accept when a game is found.
body:
Posting this for a friend since he can't log onto the forums (even though he's logged onto the client lol).

> I need help. Ever since the new client I've been having problems. Recently I tried to play a game and it crashed during the loading screen. Now I have a 20 minute penalty when searching for a game. Normally I would be OK with this, but when I'm searching for a game and it finds one, a window pops up saying I lost connection and am trying to reconnect, and then takes me out of the lobby. I have no other connection issues of any kind so I think it has something to do with the client.
Has anyone had this problem or have any ideas for how to fix this? I can't try much because it takes 20 minutes to recreate the situation.

replies.body:
This is most likely caused by intermittent connection issues between your client and our servers. Personally, I recommend that you [**Enable Low Spec Mode**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_cq2vPiYULU) and going through our [**CONNECTION GUIDE**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) to better optimize your client connection.

If the issues still persist, hit me up in a [**Tech Support Ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!

Have the same problem.  Client crashes while searching for games so I can't join.  I literally can't play games right now.  Can't submit a ticket because the forum is bugged.  I don't even have words.
